group.name: impass_box
group.comment: We need to use named simbox here because the default simbox has to extend to the back of the tower so it can be constructed from behind, but if we generated impass based on that default simbox then the tower would block traffic across the wall

float.name: ui_range_radius
float.comment: 10 is the setting for deep strike radius, if this number need to be changed, then deep strike radius needs to request programming support
